title: Lateness
author: JGray
text: Due to a medical emergency, the page is going to late. Keith and I are both fine but there are things that are distracting. Sorry, folks.

replies.author: J*Guest*
replies.text: Thanks for letting us know so we are not up all night waiting

replies.author: Ayra*Guest*
replies.text: Meep! Well, I hope whatever the medical urgency is, it ends up not being anything horrible after all...

replies.author: Ketira*Guest*
replies.text: Did one (or both) of you two catch a cold?  I hope it's nothing worse than that!  (My Dad did that over the weekend, and he's having problems shaking it.  But then, he's in his 70s....    )

replies.author: quarktime*Guest*
replies.text: Dogboy smacked one of 'em on the head with a brick for drawing him in a French maid outfit.

replies.author: JD*Guest*
replies.text:
*Dogboy smacked one of 'em on the head with a brick for drawing him in a French maid outfit.*

That is probably the most likely reason.  Even fictitious characters have feelings, you know, so let's not insult the doggie with the brick.

replies.author: Elliotd*Guest*
replies.text:
Hope y'all are doing okay and noones in seriously sick/hurt.
Page looks great =] , yea I think Thera will forgive Chrys, but it was probably better for Thera to have faced her past now than later.
